fullText: The play's central dramatic engine — the collision between Darren's candor and the team's ingrained homophobia — still purrs with relevance and power.
dtliExcerpt: The play's central dramatic engine — the collision between Darren's candor and the team's ingrained homophobia — still purrs with relevance and power.
bwwExcerpt: Featuring Jesse Williams as a superstar center fielder who comes roaring out of the closet, and Jesse Tyler Ferguson as a goofy, white-collar guy already out and newly turned on by the game, the comedy-drama has been buffed to a scintillating sheen by director Scott Ellis and his lineup of pro designers. They ensure Greenberg’s wit steps up winningly to the plate for the revival that marked its official opening Monday night at the Hayes Theatre.
